Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored the first goal for Wales in just 37 seconds
Gareth Bale scored the second goal for Wales in the 3rd minute
Kerem Aktürkoğlu scored a hat-trick for Turkey against Iceland
Ousmane Dembélé scored the second goal for France against Belgium
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy enjoyed his first win as Wales manager in 'impossible' Montenegro conditions
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in heavy rain which delayed the start by 30 minutes
Others: The score was 1-2 in favor of Wales at the end of the game
